cloud.jgo.jjdom.dom

Interface Manipulable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Document, Element, HTMLDocument, HTMLElement
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Elements, HTMLDefaultDocument, HTMLDefaultElement, XMLDocument, XMLElement

    public interface Manipulable
    Author:
    Martire91
    This interface expresses the concept of manipulable html object
